title: [Gameplay] The "eyes" that show when an enemy has vision of you never go away
body: When an enemy has hit you with an ability that grants vision of you for a few seconds, there are a pair of ["eyes"](https://d28xe8vt774jo5.cloudfront.net/champion-abilities/0051/ability_0051_W1.jpg) above your champion that warn you of this. That's all well and good, but then they never go away, even when the vision effect has ended. I'm not sure if this happens every time on every champion and mode, but I know it happens every time I get Pyke on ARAM. It's kind of impactful, because it makes it hard for me to tell when I'm out of sight for my passive.

replies.body: It happens in ARAM bc of Ashe E. Annoying but it doesn't grant extra vision. Has been like this for several patches.
